page.title: 07Bredwardine; Advantages.
page.content: Almost all residents express great satisfaction with life in the area. The tranquillity, scenic beauty, wild-life and fresh air rate highly with those who live here by choice. Those who were born here, when asked how they find life here, confess they never think about it, but certainly like things as they are. They work hard and enjoy their work, finding it difficult to understand the political, industrial, and social problems which beset city dwellers. On a material level, the difficulties of living in an isolated area are mitigated by a mobile shop, hairdresser, and Library. While many people use solid fuel or bottled gas for cooking, such items as fridges and freezers are regarded as essentials, not merely luxuries.
